chat_history.message:
Hello,
My iPhone 13 Pro has a problem:
Error in the billing address of the bill.
Thank you,

Dear ecomobile,

I am Valentina from Back Market.

A cordial greeting to you. I hope that you're having a good day. 

The customer needs the invoice because she cannot see it on the website.

Andrea Gutiérrez de las Heras
Carrer Ciutat Cooperativa 11
2o 1a
08830 Sant Boi de Llobregat null
España


Could you please send it? I will wait for your answer.

Thank you for understanding and have a nice day!

Regards,
Valentina, Back Market Customer Care.

Dear Backcare,

Attached is the invoice.

Regards,
JY
